cause.description:
No one running deserves our votes. The personality required to be a politican is invariably someone out for themselves only -- no matter how earnestly they claim to take up other causes.
They will always, eternally let us down.
Alternatives?
How about anarchy?
1. Power corrupts
2. Clean the entire house and senate
cause.mission: Make clear to all the fact that all politicians are lying, thieving criminals
cause.name: Just say no to all politicians
